content: in this court case in salerno the plaintiffs drl fe fn dfs and dfmr were ruled in favor of the court found that the defendants df and dl had illegally constructed on agricultural land that belonged to the plaintiffs the court ordered the defendants to pay the plaintiffs €3749640 and dissolved the coownership allocating the property to the plaintiffs the defendants counterclaim for the dissolution of the community was rejected the court determined the value of the property to be €7499280 and ordered the defendants to pay the plaintiffs half of this amount the plaintiffs were also ordered to bear 50 of the litigation costs due to their unreasonable insistence on a hypothetical sale of the property the court confirmed that the agricultural land and small building in pe sa belonged to the plaintiffs and should be shared equally among them dfs and dfmr were ordered to pay the plaintiffs the remaining balance additional claims were deemed inadmissible and costs of the proceedings were awarded to both parties the costs of the technical expert report were split equally between the plaintiffs and the defendant this ruling was made on april 13 2015 by a sole judge in the second civil section of the court of salerno
